items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-based system to provide personalized product recommendations to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 relevant product recommendations for each user session
Recommendations update in real-time as user interacts with the platform
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% relevance score in A/B testing
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: User requirement was high-level; assumed need for personalization, real-time updates, and performance constraints typical for e-commerce.
